ApproveSkill.name: ApproveSkill
ApproveSkill.description:
Associates a skill with the organization under the customer's AWS account. If a skill
                                                is private, the user implicitly accepts access to this skill during enablement.

AssociateContactWithAddressBook.name: AssociateContactWithAddressBook
AssociateContactWithAddressBook.description: Associates a contact with a given address book.

AssociateSkillGroupWithRoom.name: AssociateSkillGroupWithRoom
AssociateSkillGroupWithRoom.description: Associates the skill group with given room. SkillGroup ARN and Room ARN must be specified.

AssociateSkillWithSkillGroup.name: AssociateSkillWithSkillGroup
AssociateSkillWithSkillGroup.description: Associates a skill with a skill group.

AssociateSkillWithUsers.name: AssociateSkillWithUsers
AssociateSkillWithUsers.description: Makes a private skill available for enrolled users to enable on their devices.

CompleteRegistration.name: CompleteRegistration
CompleteRegistration.description: Completes the operation of registering an Alexa device.

CreateAddressBook.name: CreateAddressBook
CreateAddressBook.description: Creates an address book with the specified details.

CreateBusinessReportSchedule.name: CreateBusinessReportSchedule
CreateBusinessReportSchedule.description:
Creates a recurring schedule for usage reports to deliver to the specified S3 location
                                                with a specified daily or weekly interval.

CreateConferenceProvider.name: CreateConferenceProvider
CreateConferenceProvider.description: Adds a new conference provider under the user's AWS account.

CreateContact.name: CreateContact
CreateContact.description: Creates a contact with the specified details.

CreateRoom.name: CreateRoom
CreateRoom.description: Create room with the specified details.

CreateSkillGroup.name: CreateSkillGroup
CreateSkillGroup.description: Creates a skill group with given name and description.

DeleteAddressBook.name: DeleteAddressBook
DeleteAddressBook.description: Deletes an address book by the address book ARN.

DeleteBusinessReportSchedule.name: DeleteBusinessReportSchedule
DeleteBusinessReportSchedule.description: Deletes the recurring report delivery schedule with the specified schedule ARN.

DeleteContact.name: DeleteContact
DeleteContact.description: Deletes a contact by the contact ARN.

DeleteDevice.name: DeleteDevice
DeleteDevice.description: Removes a device from Alexa For Business.

DeleteRoomSkillParameter.name: DeleteRoomSkillParameter
DeleteRoomSkillParameter.description: Delete a parameter from a skill and room.

DeleteSkillAuthorization.name: DeleteSkillAuthorization
DeleteSkillAuthorization.description: Unlinks a third-party account from a skill.

DeleteSkillGroup.name: DeleteSkillGroup
DeleteSkillGroup.description: Deletes skill group with skill group ARN. Skillgroup ARN must be specified.

DisassociateContactFromAddressBook.name: DisassociateContactFromAddressBook
DisassociateContactFromAddressBook.description: Disassociates a contact from a given address book.

DisassociateDeviceFromRoom.name: DisassociateDeviceFromRoom
DisassociateDeviceFromRoom.description: Disassociates device from its current room.

DisassociateSkillFromSkillGroup.name: DisassociateSkillFromSkillGroup
DisassociateSkillFromSkillGroup.description: Disassociates a skill from a skill group.

DisassociateSkillFromUsers.name: DisassociateSkillFromUsers
DisassociateSkillFromUsers.description:
Makes a private skill unavailable for enrolled users and prevents them from enabling
                                                it on their devices.

DisassociateSkillGroupFromRoom.name: DisassociateSkillGroupFromRoom
DisassociateSkillGroupFromRoom.description:
Disassociates the skill group from given room. SkillGroup ARN and Room ARN must be
                                                specified.

ForgetSmartHomeAppliances.name: ForgetSmartHomeAppliances
ForgetSmartHomeAppliances.description: Forgets smart home appliances associated to a room.

GetAddressBook.name: GetAddressBook
GetAddressBook.description: Gets the address book details by the address book ARN.

GetConferenceProvider.name: GetConferenceProvider
GetConferenceProvider.description: Gets details about a specific conference provider.

GetContact.name: GetContact
GetContact.description: Gets the contact details by the contact ARN.

GetNetworkProfile.name: GetNetworkProfile
GetNetworkProfile.description: Gets the network profile details by the network profile ARN.

GetProfile.name: GetProfile
GetProfile.description: Gets profile when provided with Profile ARN.

GetRoomSkillParameter.name: GetRoomSkillParameter
GetRoomSkillParameter.description: Get an existing parameter that has been set for a skill and room.

GetSkillGroup.name: GetSkillGroup
GetSkillGroup.description: Gets skill group details with skill group ARN. Skillgroup ARN must be specified.

ListBusinessReportSchedules.name: ListBusinessReportSchedules
ListBusinessReportSchedules.description: Lists the details of the schedules that a user configured.

ListConferenceProviders.name: ListConferenceProviders
ListConferenceProviders.description: Lists conference providers under a specific AWS account.

ListDeviceEvents.name: ListDeviceEvents
ListDeviceEvents.description: Lists the device event history, including device connection status, for up to 30 days.

ListSkillsStoreCategories.name: ListSkillsStoreCategories
ListSkillsStoreCategories.description: Lists all categories in the Alexa skill store.

ListSkillsStoreSkillsByCategory.name: ListSkillsStoreSkillsByCategory
ListSkillsStoreSkillsByCategory.description: Lists all skills in the Alexa skill store by category.

ListSmartHomeAppliances.name: ListSmartHomeAppliances
ListSmartHomeAppliances.description: Lists all of the smart home appliances associated with a room.

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Lists all tags on a resource.

PutConferencePreference.name: PutConferencePreference
PutConferencePreference.description: Sets the conference preferences on a specific conference provider at the account level.

PutRoomSkillParameter.name: PutRoomSkillParameter
PutRoomSkillParameter.description: Put a room specific parameter for a skill.

PutSkillAuthorization.name: PutSkillAuthorization
PutSkillAuthorization.description:
Links a user's account to a third-party skill provider. If this API operation is called
                                                by an assumed IAM role, the skill being linked must be a private skill. Also, the
                                                skill must be owned by the AWS account that assumed the IAM role.

RegisterAVSDevice.name: RegisterAVSDevice
RegisterAVSDevice.description:
Registers an Alexa-enabled device built by an Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM)
                                                using Alexa Voice Service (AVS).

RejectSkill.name: RejectSkill
RejectSkill.description:
Disassociates a skill from the organization under a user's AWS account. If the skill
                                                is a private skill, it moves to an AcceptStatus of PENDING.

SearchAddressBooks.name: SearchAddressBooks
SearchAddressBooks.description: Searches address books and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.

SearchContacts.name: SearchContacts
SearchContacts.description: Searches contacts and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.

SearchNetworkProfiles.name: SearchNetworkProfiles
SearchNetworkProfiles.description: Searches network profiles and lists the ones that meet a set of filter and sort criteria.

SendInvitation.name: SendInvitation
SendInvitation.description: Send an invitation to a user.

StartDeviceSync.name: StartDeviceSync
StartDeviceSync.description:
Restore the device and its account to its known, default settings by clearing all
                                                information and settings set by its previous users.

StartSmartHomeApplianceDiscovery.name: StartSmartHomeApplianceDiscovery
StartSmartHomeApplianceDiscovery.description: Initiates the discovery of any smart home appliances associated with the room.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Adds metadata tags to a resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Removes metadata tags from a resource.

UpdateAddressBook.name: UpdateAddressBook
UpdateAddressBook.description: Updates address book details by the address book ARN.

UpdateBusinessReportSchedule.name: UpdateBusinessReportSchedule
UpdateBusinessReportSchedule.description:
Updates the configuration of the report delivery schedule with the specified schedule
                                                ARN.

UpdateConferenceProvider.name: UpdateConferenceProvider
UpdateConferenceProvider.description: Updates an existing conference provider's settings.

UpdateContact.name: UpdateContact
UpdateContact.description: Updates the contact details by the contact ARN.

UpdateSkillGroup.name: UpdateSkillGroup
UpdateSkillGroup.description: Updates skill group details with skill group ARN. Skillgroup ARN must be specified.
